text:
@realDonaldTrump Anyone who believes in or is pushing the BS idea that the #CoronaVirus is President Trump’s fault, not China’s, should seek immediate mental health help.

Russia Hoax I-fail
Ukraine Hoax I-fail
Impeachment Hoax-I fail
Russia Hoax II-fail
Coronavirus I-fail

Figured it out yet?

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
